item.title: About me
item.description: This is Issey Sukeda. Currently, I am a D1 student under the supervision of Prof. Tomonari Sei and Prof. Takeru Matsuda. My interest covers statistics and operations research. My full publications can be accessed from Publications. Any collaboration, job offer, or discussion is welcome ! ğŸ”¥ News Oct. 2024 ğŸ‰ Our paper was accepted in Statistical Papers! Oct. 2024 ğŸ‰ Our paper was accepted in Statistics & Probability Letters! Oct. 2024 ğŸ‰ My paper was accepted in NeurIPS Workshop 2024 AIM-FM!
